response.original_title: No somos números, un suspiro de lxs otrxs
response.overview: Audiovisual documentary research project that explores the diverse perspectives of 4 people who use mobile devices outside of social conventions: El Holandés (craftsman); Agustín (professor and electronic engineer specialized in quantum computing); Lucila (teacher and researcher of body movement) and Cristian (musician and bricklayer). Through their testimonies, the project presents a collective and reflective account of the experiences with mobile devices and the impact on our daily lives, challenging the notion of "normality" that we have come to accept and inviting the viewer to reflect with us.
response.title: No somos números, un suspiro de lxs otrxs
